headline.main: HELP RUSSIA NOW, J.E. DAVIES URGES; Former Envoy Tells of Peril of Japanese Attack as the Nazis Renew Drive SOVIET VICTORY FORECAST Next Six Months Expected to Decide Whether War Lasts 40 Months or 40 Years

lead_paragraph: Foreseing the possibility of a Japanese attack on Soviet Russia simultaneously with a resumption or the Nazi offensive against the Red armies, Joseph E. Davies, former American Ambassador to Russia, yesterday urged that the United States send the greatest possible assistance to the Russians to forestall disaster for the anti-Axis cause.
abstract: J E Davies urges all-out U S aid to USSR now
